text.div: This code system http://www.nubc.org/TypeOfBill defines many codes, but they are not represented here

name: AHANUBCTypeOfBill
title: AHA NUBC Type of Bill
copyright:
The Official UB-04 Data Specifications Manual, copyrighted by the American Hospital Association, is the only official source of UB-04 billing information adopted by the National Uniform Billing Committee. 
No other publication—governmental or private/commercial—can be considered authoritative. See their website for licensing terms and conditions.
As HL7 is working with the owning authority to finalize the url, this url is subject to change.
